   16: 
   17: -module(component_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -import(reload_helper, [modify_config_file/3,
   26:                         backup_ejabberd_config_file/2,
   27:                         restore_ejabberd_config_file/2,
   28:                         reload_through_ctl/2,
   29:                         restart_ejabberd_node/1]).
   30: 
   31: -import(distributed_helper, [add_node_to_cluster/1,
   32:                              remove_node_from_cluster/1]).
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% Suite configuration
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: 
   38: all() ->
   39:     [{group, xep0114_tcp},
   40:      {group, xep0114_ws},
   41:      {group, subdomain},
   42:      {group, distributed}].
   43: 
   44: groups() ->
   45:     [{xep0114_tcp, [], xep0114_tests()},
   46:      {xep0114_ws, [], xep0114_tests()},
   47:      {subdomain, [], [register_subdomain]},
   48:      {distributed, [], [register_in_cluster, register_same_on_both]}].
   49: 
   50: suite() ->
   51:     escalus:suite().
   52: 
   53: xep0114_tests() ->
   54:     [register_one_component,
   55:      register_two_components,
   56:      try_registering_with_wrong_password,
   57:      try_registering_component_twice,
   58:      try_registering_existing_host,
   59:      disco_components].
   60: 
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: %% Init & teardown
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: 
   65: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   66:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config),
   67:     ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config1).
   68: 
   69: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   70:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   71: 
   72: init_per_group(xep0114_tcp, Config) ->
   73:     Config1 = get_components([], Config),
   74:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice, bob]));
   75: init_per_group(xep0114_ws, Config) ->
   76:     WSOpts = [{transport, ws},
   77:               {wspath, <<"/ws-xmpp">>},
   78:               {wslegacy, true},
   79:               {port, 5280}],
   80:     Config1 = get_components(WSOpts, Config),
   81:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice, bob]));
   82: init_per_group(subdomain, Config) ->
   83:     Config1 = get_components([], Config),
   84:     add_domain(Config1),
   85:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice, astrid]));
   86: init_per_group(distributed, Config) ->
   87:     Config1 = get_components([], Config),
   88:     Config2 = add_node_to_cluster(Config1),
   89:     escalus:create_users(Config2, escalus:get_users([alice, clusterguy]));
   90: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   91:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   92: 
   93: end_per_group(subdomain, Config) ->
   94:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, astrid])),
   95:     restore_domain(Config);
   96: end_per_group(distributed, Config) ->
   97:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, clusterguy])),
   98:     remove_node_from_cluster(Config);
   99: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  100:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
  101: 
  102: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  103:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  104: 
  105: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  106:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  107: 
  108: 
  109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  110: %% Tests
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: register_one_component(Config) ->
  113:     %% Given one connected component
  114:     CompOpts = spec(component1, Config),
  115:     {Component, ComponentAddr, _} = connect_component(CompOpts),
  116: 
  117:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  118:                 %% When Alice sends a message to the component
  119:                 Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(ComponentAddr, <<"Hi!">>),
  120:                 escalus:send(Alice, Msg1),
  121:                 %% Then component receives it
  122:                 Reply1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Component),
  123:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], Reply1),
  124: 
  125:                 %% When component sends a reply
  126:                 Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Oh hi!">>),
  127:                 escalus:send(Component, escalus_stanza:from(Msg2, ComponentAddr)),
  128: 
  129:                 %% Then Alice receives it
  130:                 Reply2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  131:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Oh hi!">>], Reply2),
  132:                 escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [ComponentAddr], Reply2)
  133:         end),
  134: 
  135:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Component).
  136: 
  137: register_two_components(Config) ->
  138:     %% Given two connected components
  139:     CompOpts1 = spec(component1, Config),
  140:     CompOpts2 = spec(component2, Config),
  141:     {Comp1, CompAddr1, _} = connect_component(CompOpts1),
  142:     {Comp2, CompAddr2, _} = connect_component(CompOpts2),
  143: 
  144:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  145:                 %% When Alice sends a message to the first component
  146:                 Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"abc">>),
  147:                 escalus:send(Comp1, escalus_stanza:from(Msg1, CompAddr1)),
  148:                 %% Then component receives it
  149:                 Reply1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  150:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"abc">>], Reply1),
  151:                 escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [CompAddr1], Reply1),
  152: 
  153:                 %% When Bob sends a message to the second component
  154:                 Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"def">>),
  155:                 escalus:send(Comp2, escalus_stanza:from(Msg2, CompAddr2)),
  156:                 %% Then it also receives it
  157:                 Reply2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  158:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"def">>], Reply2),
  159:                 escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [CompAddr2], Reply2),
  160: 
  161:                 %% When the second component sends a reply to Bob
  162:                 Msg3 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(CompAddr2, <<"ghi">>),
  163:                 escalus:send(Bob, Msg3),
  164:                 %% Then he receives it
  165:                 Reply3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Comp2),
  166:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"ghi">>], Reply3),
  167: 
  168:                 %% WHen the first component sends a reply to Alice
  169:                 Msg4 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(CompAddr1, <<"jkl">>),
  170:                 escalus:send(Alice, Msg4),
  171:                 %% Then she receives it
  172:                 Reply4 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Comp1),
  173:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"jkl">>], Reply4)
  174:         end),
  175: 
  176:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp1),
  177:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp2).
  178: 
  179: try_registering_with_wrong_password(Config) ->
  180:     %% Given a component with a wrong password
  181:     CompOpts1 = spec(component1, Config),
  182:     CompOpts2 = lists:keyreplace(password, 1, CompOpts1,
  183:                                  {password, <<"wrong_one">>}),
  184: 
  185:     try
  186:         %% When trying to connect it
  187:         {Comp, _Addr, _} = connect_component(CompOpts2),
  188:         ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp),
  189:         ct:fail("component connected successfully with wrong password")
  190:     catch {stream_error, E} ->
  191:         %% Then it should fail to do so
  192:         ok
  193:     end.
  194: 
  195: try_registering_component_twice(Config) ->
  196:     %% Given two components with the same name
  197:     CompOpts1 = spec(component1, Config),
  198:     {Comp1, Addr, _} = connect_component(CompOpts1),
  199: 
  200:     try
  201:         %% When trying to connect the second one
  202:         {Comp2, Addr, _} = connect_component(CompOpts1),
  203:         ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp2),
  204:         ct:fail("second component connected successfully")
  205:     catch {stream_error, _} ->
  206:         %% Then it should fail to do so
  207:         ok
  208:     end,
  209: 
  210:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp1).
  211: 
  212: try_registering_existing_host(Config) ->
  213:     %% Given a external muc component
  214:     Component = spec(muc_component, Config),
  215: 
  216:     try
  217:         %% When trying to connect it to the server
  218:         {Comp, _Addr, _} = connect_component(Component),
  219:         ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp),
  220:         ct:fail("muc component connected successfully")
  221:     catch {stream_error, _} ->
  222:         %% Then it should fail since muc service already exists on the server
  223:         ok
  224:     end.
  225: 
  226: disco_components(Config) ->
  227:     %% Given two connected components
  228:     CompOpts1 = spec(component1, Config),
  229:     CompOpts2 = spec(component2, Config),
  230:     {Comp1, Addr1, _} = connect_component(CompOpts1),
  231:     {Comp2, Addr2, _} = connect_component(CompOpts2),
  232: 
  233:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  234:                 %% When server asked for the disco features
  235:                 Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  236:                 Disco = escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server),
  237:                 escalus:send(Alice, Disco),
  238: 
  239:                 %% Then it contains hosts of 2 components
  240:                 DiscoReply = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  241:                 escalus:assert(has_service, [Addr1], DiscoReply),
  242:                 escalus:assert(has_service, [Addr2], DiscoReply)
  243:         end),
  244: 
  245:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp1),
  246:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp2).
  247: 
  248: register_subdomain(Config) ->
  249:     %% Given one connected component
  250:     CompOpts1 = spec(component1, Config),
  251:     {Comp, _Addr, Name} = connect_component_subdomain(CompOpts1),
  252: 
  253:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {astrid, 1}], fun(Alice, Astrid) ->
  254:                 %% When Alice asks for service discovery on the server
  255:                 Server1 = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  256:                 Disco1 = escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server1),
  257:                 escalus:send(Alice, Disco1),
  258: 
  259:                 %% Then it contains the registered route
  260:                 DiscoReply1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  261:                 ComponentHost1 = <<Name/binary, ".", Server1/binary>>,
  262:                 escalus:assert(has_service, [ComponentHost1], DiscoReply1),
  263: 
  264:                 %% When Astrid ask for service discovery on her server
  265:                 Server2 = escalus_client:server(Astrid),
  266:                 false = (Server1 =:= Server2),
  267:                 Disco2 = escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server2),
  268:                 escalus:send(Astrid, Disco2),
  269: 
  270:                 %% Then it also contains the registered route
  271:                 DiscoReply2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Astrid),
  272:                 ComponentHost2 = <<Name/binary, ".", Server2/binary>>,
  273:                 escalus:assert(has_service, [ComponentHost2], DiscoReply2)
  274: 
  275:         end),
  276: 
  277:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp).
  278: 
  279: 
  280: register_in_cluster(Config) ->
  281:     %% Given one component connected to the cluster
  282:     CompOpts1 = spec(component1, Config),
  283:     Component1 = connect_component(CompOpts1),
  284:     {Comp1, _, _} = Component1,
  285:     CompOpts2 = spec(component2, Config),
  286:     Component2 = connect_component(CompOpts2),
  287:     {Comp2, _, _} = Component2,
  288:     CompOpts_on_2 = spec(component_on_2, Config),
  289:     Component_on_2 = connect_component(CompOpts_on_2),
  290:     {Comp_on_2, _, _} = Component_on_2,
  291: 
  292:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {clusterguy, 1}], fun(Alice, ClusterGuy) ->
  293:                 do_chat_with_component(Alice, ClusterGuy, Component1),
  294:                 do_chat_with_component(Alice, ClusterGuy, Component2),
  295:                 do_chat_with_component(Alice, ClusterGuy, Component_on_2)
  296:         end),
  297: 
  298:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp1),
  299:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp2),
  300:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp_on_2),
  301:     ok.
  302: 
  303: do_chat_with_component(Alice, ClusterGuy, Component1) ->
  304:     {Comp, Addr, Name} = Component1,
  305: 
  306:     %% When Alice sends a message to the component
  307:     Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Addr, <<"Hi!">>),
  308:     escalus:send(Alice, Msg1),
  309:     %% Then component receives it
  310:     Reply1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Comp),
  311:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], Reply1),
  312: 
  313:     %% When components sends a reply
  314:     Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Oh hi!">>),
  315:     escalus:send(Comp, escalus_stanza:from(Msg2, Addr)),
  316: 
  317:     %% Then Alice receives it
  318:     Reply2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  319:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Oh hi!">>], Reply2),
  320:     escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Addr], Reply2),
  321: 
  322:     %% When ClusterGuy (connected to the other node than component)
  323:     %% sends a message
  324:     Msg3 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Addr, <<"Hello!">>),
  325:     escalus:send(ClusterGuy, Msg3),
  326:     %% Then component receives it
  327:     Reply3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Comp),
  328:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hello!">>], Reply3),
  329: 
  330:     %% When components sends a reply
  331:     Msg4 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(ClusterGuy, <<"Hola!">>),
  332:     escalus:send(Comp, escalus_stanza:from(Msg4, Addr)),
  333: 
  334:     %% Then ClusterGuy receives it
  335:     Reply4 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(ClusterGuy),
  336:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hola!">>], Reply4),
  337:     escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Addr], Reply4),
  338: 
  339:     %% When Alice asks for the disco features
  340:     Server1 = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  341:     Disco1 = escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server1),
  342:     escalus:send(Alice, Disco1),
  343: 
  344:     %% Then it contains host of the service
  345:     DiscoReply1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  346:     escalus:assert(has_service, [Addr], DiscoReply1),
  347: 
  348:     %% When ClusterGuy asks for the disco features on her server
  349:     Server2 = escalus_client:server(ClusterGuy),
  350:     Disco2 = escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server2),
  351:     escalus:send(ClusterGuy, Disco2),
  352: 
  353:     %% Then it also contains the service (with the other address though)
  354:     DiscoReply2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(ClusterGuy),
  355:     DistributedAddr = <<Name/binary, ".", Server2/binary>>,
  356:     escalus:assert(has_service, [DistributedAddr], DiscoReply2).
  357: 
  358: 
  359: register_same_on_both(Config) ->
  360:     %% Given two components with the same name
  361:     %% but not on the same host
  362:     %% we should be able to register
  363:     %% and we get two components having the same name and address
  364:     CompOpts2 = spec(component2, Config),
  365:     Component2 = connect_component(CompOpts2),
  366:     ct:pal("~p", [Component2]),
  367:     {Comp2, Addr, Name} = Component2,
  368:     CompOpts_d = spec(component_duplicate, Config),
  369:     Component_d = connect_component(CompOpts_d),
  370:     ct:pal("~p", [Component_d]),
  371:     {Comp_d, Addr, Name} = Component_d,
  372: 
  373:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {clusterguy, 1}], fun(Alice, ClusterGuy) ->
  374:         %% When Alice sends a message to the component
  375:         Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Addr, <<"Hi!">>),
  376:         ct:pal("~p", [Msg1]),
  377:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg1),
  378:         %% Then component receives it (on the same node)
  379:         Reply1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Comp2),
  380:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi!">>], Reply1),
  381: 
  382:         %% When components sends a reply
  383:         Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Oh hi!">>),
  384:         escalus:send(Comp2, escalus_stanza:from(Msg2, Addr)),
  385: 
  386:         %% Then Alice receives it
  387:         Reply2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  388:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Oh hi!">>], Reply2),
  389:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Addr], Reply2),
  390: 
  391:         %% When ClusterGuy (connected to the other node than component)
  392:         %% sends a message
  393:         Msg3 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Addr, <<"Hello!">>),
  394:         escalus:send(ClusterGuy, Msg3),
  395:         %% Then component on his node receives it
  396:         Reply3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Comp_d),
  397:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hello!">>], Reply3),
  398: 
  399:         %% When components sends a reply
  400:         Msg4 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(ClusterGuy, <<"Hola!">>),
  401:         escalus:send(Comp_d, escalus_stanza:from(Msg4, Addr)),
  402: 
  403:         %% Then ClusterGuy receives it
  404:         Reply4 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(ClusterGuy),
  405:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hola!">>], Reply4),
  406:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Addr], Reply4),
  407: 
  408:         %% When Alice asks for the disco features
  409:         Server1 = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  410:         Disco1 = escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server1),
  411:         escalus:send(Alice, Disco1),
  412: 
  413:         %% Then it contains host of the service
  414:         DiscoReply1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  415:         escalus:assert(has_service, [Addr], DiscoReply1),
  416: 
  417:         %% When ClusterGuy asks for the disco features on her server
  418:         Server2 = escalus_client:server(ClusterGuy),
  419:         Disco2 = escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server2),
  420:         escalus:send(ClusterGuy, Disco2),
  421: 
  422:         %% Then it also contains the same service
  423:         DiscoReply2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(ClusterGuy),
  424:         escalus:assert(has_service, [Addr], DiscoReply2)
  425: 
  426:     end),
  427:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp2),
  428:     ok = escalus_connection:stop(Comp_d),
  429:     ok.
  430: 
  431: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  432: %% Helpers
  433: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  434: 
  435: get_components(Opts, Config) ->
  436:     Components = [component1, component2, muc_component],
  437:     [ {C, Opts ++ spec(C, Config)} || C <- Components ] ++ Config.
  438: 
  439: connect_component(Component) ->
  440:     connect_component(Component, component_start_stream).
  441: 
  442: connect_component_subdomain(Component) ->
  443:     connect_component(Component, component_start_stream_subdomain).
  444: 
  445: connect_component(ComponentOpts, StartStep) ->
  446:     Res = escalus_connection:start(ComponentOpts,
  447:                                                      [{?MODULE, StartStep},
  448:                                                       {?MODULE, component_handshake}]),
  449:     case Res of
  450:     {ok, Component, _, _} ->
  451:         {component, ComponentName} = lists:keyfind(component, 1, ComponentOpts),
  452:         {host, ComponentHost} = lists:keyfind(host, 1, ComponentOpts),
  453:         ComponentAddr = <<ComponentName/binary, ".", ComponentHost/binary>>,
  454:         {Component, ComponentAddr, ComponentName};
  455:     {error, E} ->
  456:         throw(cook_connection_step_error(E))
  457:     end.
  458: 
  459: cook_connection_step_error(E) ->
  460:     {connection_step_failed, Step, Reason} = E,
  461:     {StepDef, _, _, _} = Step,
  462:     {EDef, _} = Reason,
  463:     {EDef, StepDef}.
  464: 
  465: add_domain(Config) ->
  466:     Node = default_node(Config),
  467:     Hosts = {hosts, "[\"localhost\", \"sogndal\"]"},
  468:     backup_ejabberd_config_file(Node, Config),
  469:     modify_config_file(Node, [Hosts], Config),
  470:     reload_through_ctl(Node, Config),
  471:     ok.
  472: 
  473: restore_domain(Config) ->
  474:     Node = default_node(Config),
  475:     restore_ejabberd_config_file(Node, Config),
  476:     restart_ejabberd_node(Node),
  477:     Config.
  478: 
  479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  480: %% Escalus connection steps
  481: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  482: component_start_stream(Conn, Props, []) ->
  483:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, Props),
  484:     {component, Component} = lists:keyfind(component, 1, Props),
  485: 
  486:     ComponentHost = <<Component/binary, ".", Server/binary>>,
  487:     StreamStart = component_stream_start(ComponentHost, false),
  488:     ok = escalus_connection:send(Conn, StreamStart),
  489:     StreamStartRep = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_stream),
  490: 
  491:     #xmlstreamstart{attrs = Attrs} = StreamStartRep,
  492:     Id = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs),
  493: 
  494:     {Conn, [{sid, Id}|Props], []}.
  495: 
  496: component_start_stream_subdomain(Conn, Props, []) ->
  497:     {component, Component} = lists:keyfind(component, 1, Props),
  498: 
  499:     StreamStart = component_stream_start(Component, true),
  500:     ok = escalus_connection:send(Conn, StreamStart),
  501:     StreamStartRep = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_stream),
  502: 
  503:     #xmlstreamstart{attrs = Attrs} = StreamStartRep,
  504:     Id = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs),
  505: 
  506:     {Conn, [{sid, Id}|Props], []}.
  507: 
  508: component_handshake(Conn, Props, []) ->
  509:     {password, Password} = lists:keyfind(password, 1, Props),
  510:     {sid, SID} = lists:keyfind(sid, 1, Props),
  511: 
  512:     Handshake = component_handshake(SID, Password),
  513:     ok = escalus_connection:send(Conn, Handshake),
  514: 
  515:     HandshakeRep = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, handshake),
  516:     case HandshakeRep of
  517:         #xmlel{name = <<"handshake">>, children = []} ->
  518:             {Conn, Props, []};
  519:         #xmlel{name = <<"stream:error">>} ->
  520:             throw({stream_error, HandshakeRep})
  521:     end.
  522: 
  523: 
  524: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  525: %% Stanzas
  526: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  527: component_stream_start(Component, IsSubdomain) ->
  528:     Attrs1 = [{<<"to">>, Component},
  529:               {<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:component:accept">>},
  530:               {<<"xmlns:stream">>,
  531:                <<"http://etherx.jabber.org/streams">>}],
  532:     Attrs2 = case IsSubdomain of
  533:         false ->
  534:             Attrs1;
  535:         true ->
  536:             [{<<"is_subdomain">>, <<"true">>}|Attrs1]
  537:     end,
  538:     #xmlstreamstart{name = <<"stream:stream">>, attrs = Attrs2}.
  539: 
  540: component_handshake(SID, Password) ->
  541:     Handshake = crypto:hash(sha, <<SID/binary, Password/binary>>),
  542:     #xmlel{name = <<"handshake">>,
  543:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = base16:encode(Handshake)}]}.
  544: 
  545: cluster_users() ->
  546:     AllUsers = ct:get_config(escalus_users),
  547:     [proplists:lookup(alice, AllUsers), proplists:lookup(clusterguy, AllUsers)].
  548: 
  549: default_node(Config) ->
  550:     Node = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_node, Config),
  551:     Node == undefined andalso error(node_undefined, [Config]),
  552:     Node.
  553: 
  554: spec(component1, Config) ->
  555:     [{component, <<"test_service">>}] ++ common(Config);
  556: spec(component2, Config) ->
  557:     [{component, <<"another_service">>}] ++ common(Config);
  558: spec(component_on_2, Config) ->
  559:     [{component, <<"yet_another_service">>}] ++ common(Config, 8899);
  560: spec(component_duplicate, Config) ->
  561:     [{component, <<"another_service">>}] ++ common(Config, 8899);
  562: spec(muc_component, Config) ->
  563:     [{component, <<"muc">>}] ++ common(Config).
  564: 
  565: common(Config) ->
  566:     common(Config, 8888).
  567: 
  568: common(Config, Port) ->
  569:     [{server, ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config)},
  570:      {host, ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config)},
  571:      {password, <<"secret">>},
  572:      {port, Port}].
